summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, H. E. Nelson Addition, being the alley between 23rd Avenue Northwest and 22nd Avenue Northwest, from West 83rd Street to West 85th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 13092 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
